mapper.select: select notice_no, notice_id, notice_title, notice_content, notice_date, notice_time from notice order by notice_no desc
mapper.insert:
insert into notice(notice_title, notice_id, notice_content, notice_date, notice_time) values (#{notice_title}, #{notice_id}, #{notice_content}, date_format(now(), '%Y년 %m월 %d일'),
date_format(now(), '오후 %H시 %i분')
date_format(now(), '오전 %H시 %i분')
)
